53  /**
54   * Tests invocation of the {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.MasterObserver}
55   * interface hooks at all appropriate times during normal HMaster operations.
56   */
57  @Category(MediumTests.class)
58  public class TestMasterObserver {
59    private static final Log LOG = LogFactory.getLog(TestMasterObserver.class);
60  
61    public static class CPMasterObserver implements MasterObserver {
62  
63      private boolean bypass = false;
64      private boolean preCreateTableCalled;
65      private boolean postCreateTableCalled;
66      private boolean preDeleteTableCalled;
67      private boolean postDeleteTableCalled;
68      private boolean preModifyTableCalled;
69      private boolean postModifyTableCalled;
70      private boolean preAddColumnCalled;
71      private boolean postAddColumnCalled;
72      private boolean preModifyColumnCalled;
73      private boolean postModifyColumnCalled;
74      private boolean preDeleteColumnCalled;
75      private boolean postDeleteColumnCalled;
76      private boolean preEnableTableCalled;
77      private boolean postEnableTableCalled;
78      private boolean preDisableTableCalled;
79      private boolean postDisableTableCalled;
80      private boolean preMoveCalled;
81      private boolean postMoveCalled;
82      private boolean preAssignCalled;
83      private boolean postAssignCalled;
84      private boolean preUnassignCalled;
85      private boolean postUnassignCalled;
86      private boolean preBalanceCalled;
87      private boolean postBalanceCalled;
88      private boolean preBalanceSwitchCalled;
89      private boolean postBalanceSwitchCalled;
90      private boolean preShutdownCalled;
91      private boolean preStopMasterCalled;
92      private boolean postStartMasterCalled;
93      private boolean startCalled;
94      private boolean stopCalled;
95      private boolean preSnapshotCalled;
96      private boolean postSnapshotCalled;
97      private boolean preCloneSnapshotCalled;
98      private boolean postCloneSnapshotCalled;
99      private boolean preRestoreSnapshotCalled;
100     private boolean postRestoreSnapshotCalled;
101     private boolean preDeleteSnapshotCalled;
102     private boolean postDeleteSnapshotCalled;
103 
104     public void enableBypass(boolean bypass) {
105       this.bypass = bypass;
106     }
107 
108     public void resetStates() {
109       preCreateTableCalled = false;
110       postCreateTableCalled = false;
111       preDeleteTableCalled = false;
112       postDeleteTableCalled = false;
113       preModifyTableCalled = false;
114       postModifyTableCalled = false;
115       preAddColumnCalled = false;
116       postAddColumnCalled = false;
117       preModifyColumnCalled = false;
118       postModifyColumnCalled = false;
119       preDeleteColumnCalled = false;
120       postDeleteColumnCalled = false;
121       preEnableTableCalled = false;
122       postEnableTableCalled = false;
123       preDisableTableCalled = false;
124       postDisableTableCalled = false;
125       preMoveCalled= false;
126       postMoveCalled = false;
127       preAssignCalled = false;
128       postAssignCalled = false;
129       preUnassignCalled = false;
130       postUnassignCalled = false;
131       preBalanceCalled = false;
132       postBalanceCalled = false;
133       preBalanceSwitchCalled = false;
134       postBalanceSwitchCalled = false;
135       preSnapshotCalled = false;
136       postSnapshotCalled = false;
137       preCloneSnapshotCalled = false;
138       postCloneSnapshotCalled = false;
139       preRestoreSnapshotCalled = false;
140       postRestoreSnapshotCalled = false;
141       preDeleteSnapshotCalled = false;
142       postDeleteSnapshotCalled = false;
143     }
144 
145     @Override
146     public void preCreateTable(ObserverContext<MasterCoprocessorEnvironment> env,
147         HTableDescriptor desc, HRegionInfo[] regions) throws IOException {
148       if (bypass) {
149         env.bypass();
150       }
151       preCreateTableCalled = true;
152     }
153 
154     @Override
155     public void postCreateTable(ObserverContext<MasterCoprocessorEnvironment> env,
156         HTableDescriptor desc, HRegionInfo[] regions) throws IOException {
157       postCreateTableCalled = true;
158     }
159 
160     public boolean wasCreateTableCalled() {
161       return preCreateTableCalled && postCreateTableCalled;
162     }
163 
164     public boolean preCreateTableCalledOnly() {
165       return preCreateTableCalled && !postCreateTableCalled;
166     }
167 
168     @Override
169     public void preDeleteTable(ObserverContext<MasterCoprocessorEnvironment> env,
170         byte[] tableName) throws IOException {
171       if (bypass) {
172         env.bypass();
173       }
174       preDeleteTableCalled = true;
175     }
176 
177     @Override
178     public void postDeleteTable(ObserverContext<MasterCoprocessorEnvironment> env,
179         byte[] tableName) throws IOException {
180       postDeleteTableCalled = true;
181     }
182 
183     public boolean wasDeleteTableCalled() {
184       return preDeleteTableCalled && postDeleteTableCalled;
185     }
186 
187     public boolean preDeleteTableCalledOnly() {
188       return preDeleteTableCalled && !postDeleteTableCalled;
189     }

423     @Override
424     public boolean preBalanceSwitch(ObserverContext<MasterCoprocessorEnvironment> env, boolean b)
425         throws IOException {
426       if (bypass) {
427         env.bypass();

429       preBalanceSwitchCalled = true;
430       return b;
431     }

469     @Override

477     }

479     public boolean wasStarted() { return startCalled; }
480

553 
554   private static HBaseTestingUtility UTIL = new HBaseTestingUtility();
555   private static byte[] TEST_SNAPSHOT = Bytes.toBytes("observed_snapshot");
556   private static byte[] TEST_TABLE = Bytes.toBytes("observed_table");
557   private static byte[] TEST_CLONE = Bytes.toBytes("observed_clone");
558   private static byte[] TEST_FAMILY = Bytes.toBytes("fam1");
559   private static byte[] TEST_FAMILY2 = Bytes.toBytes("fam2");
560 
561   @BeforeClass
562   public static void setupBeforeClass() throws Exception {
563     Configuration conf = UTIL.getConfiguration();
564     conf.set(CoprocessorHost.MASTER_COPROCESSOR_CONF_KEY,
565         CPMasterObserver.class.getName());
566     // Enable snapshot
567     conf.setBoolean(SnapshotManager.HBASE_SNAPSHOT_ENABLED, true);
568     // We need more than one data server on this test
569     UTIL.startMiniCluster(2);
570   }
571 
572   @AfterClass
573   public static void tearDownAfterClass() throws Exception {
574     UTIL.shutdownMiniCluster();
575   }
576 
577   @Test
578   public void testStarted() throws Exception {
579     MiniHBaseCluster cluster = UTIL.getHBaseCluster();
580 
581     HMaster master = cluster.getMaster();
582     assertTrue("Master should be active", master.isActiveMaster());
583     MasterCoprocessorHost host = master.getCoprocessorHost();
584     assertNotNull("CoprocessorHost should not be null", host);
585     CPMasterObserver cp = (CPMasterObserver)host.findCoprocessor(
586         CPMasterObserver.class.getName());
587     assertNotNull("CPMasterObserver coprocessor not found or not installed!", cp);
588 
589     // check basic lifecycle
590     assertTrue("MasterObserver should have been started", cp.wasStarted());
591     assertTrue("postStartMaster() hook should have been called",
592         cp.wasStartMasterCalled());
593   }
594 
595   @Test
596   public void testTableOperations() throws Exception {
597     MiniHBaseCluster cluster = UTIL.getHBaseCluster();
598 
599     HMaster master = cluster.getMaster();
600     MasterCoprocessorHost host = master.getCoprocessorHost();
601     CPMasterObserver cp = (CPMasterObserver)host.findCoprocessor(
602         CPMasterObserver.class.getName());
603     cp.enableBypass(true);
604     cp.resetStates();
605     assertFalse("No table created yet", cp.wasCreateTableCalled());
606 
607     // create a table
608     HTableDescriptor htd = new HTableDescriptor(TEST_TABLE);
609     htd.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(TEST_FAMILY));
610     HBaseAdmin admin = UTIL.getHBaseAdmin();
611 
612     admin.createTable(htd);
613     // preCreateTable can't bypass default action.
614     assertTrue("Test table should be created", cp.wasCreateTableCalled());
615 
616     admin.disableTable(TEST_TABLE);
617     assertTrue(admin.isTableDisabled(TEST_TABLE));
618     // preDisableTable can't bypass default action.
619     assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on table disable",
620       cp.wasDisableTableCalled());
621 
622     // enable
623     assertFalse(cp.wasEnableTableCalled());
624     admin.enableTable(TEST_TABLE);
625     assertTrue(admin.isTableEnabled(TEST_TABLE));
626     // preEnableTable can't bypass default action.
627     assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on table enable",
628       cp.wasEnableTableCalled());
629 
630     admin.disableTable(TEST_TABLE);
631     assertTrue(admin.isTableDisabled(TEST_TABLE));
632 
633     // modify table
634     htd.setMaxFileSize(512 * 1024 * 1024);
635     modifyTableSync(admin, TEST_TABLE, htd);
636     // preModifyTable can't bypass default action.
637     assertTrue("Test table should have been modified",
638       cp.wasModifyTableCalled());
639 
640     // add a column family
641     admin.addColumn(TEST_TABLE, new HColumnDescriptor(TEST_FAMILY2));
642     assertTrue("New column family shouldn't have been added to test table",
643       cp.preAddColumnCalledOnly());
644 
645     // modify a column family
646     HColumnDescriptor hcd1 = new HColumnDescriptor(TEST_FAMILY2);
647     hcd1.setMaxVersions(25);
648     admin.modifyColumn(TEST_TABLE, hcd1);
649     assertTrue("Second column family should be modified",
650       cp.preModifyColumnCalledOnly());
651 
652     // delete table
653     admin.deleteTable(TEST_TABLE);
654     assertFalse("Test table should have been deleted",
655         admin.tableExists(TEST_TABLE));
656     // preDeleteTable can't bypass default action.
657     assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on table delete",
658       cp.wasDeleteTableCalled());
659 
660 
661     // turn off bypass, run the tests again
662     cp.enableBypass(false);
663     cp.resetStates();
664 
665     admin.createTable(htd);
666     assertTrue("Test table should be created", cp.wasCreateTableCalled());
667 
668     // disable
669     assertFalse(cp.wasDisableTableCalled());
670 
671     admin.disableTable(TEST_TABLE);
672     assertTrue(admin.isTableDisabled(TEST_TABLE));
673     assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on table disable",
674       cp.wasDisableTableCalled());
675 
676     // modify table
677     htd.setMaxFileSize(512 * 1024 * 1024);
678     modifyTableSync(admin, TEST_TABLE, htd);
679     assertTrue("Test table should have been modified",
680         cp.wasModifyTableCalled());
681 
682     // add a column family
683     admin.addColumn(TEST_TABLE, new HColumnDescriptor(TEST_FAMILY2));
684     assertTrue("New column family should have been added to test table",
685         cp.wasAddColumnCalled());
686 
687     // modify a column family
688     HColumnDescriptor hcd = new HColumnDescriptor(TEST_FAMILY2);
689     hcd.setMaxVersions(25);
690     admin.modifyColumn(TEST_TABLE, hcd);
691     assertTrue("Second column family should be modified",
692         cp.wasModifyColumnCalled());
693 
694     // enable
695     assertFalse(cp.wasEnableTableCalled());
696     admin.enableTable(TEST_TABLE);
697     assertTrue(admin.isTableEnabled(TEST_TABLE));
698     assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on table enable",
699         cp.wasEnableTableCalled());
700 
701     // disable again
702     admin.disableTable(TEST_TABLE);
703     assertTrue(admin.isTableDisabled(TEST_TABLE));
704 
705     // delete column
706     assertFalse("No column family deleted yet", cp.wasDeleteColumnCalled());
707     admin.deleteColumn(TEST_TABLE, TEST_FAMILY2);
708     HTableDescriptor tableDesc = admin.getTableDescriptor(TEST_TABLE);
709     assertNull("'"+Bytes.toString(TEST_FAMILY2)+"' should have been removed",
710         tableDesc.getFamily(TEST_FAMILY2));
711     assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on column delete",
712         cp.wasDeleteColumnCalled());
713 
714     // delete table
715     assertFalse("No table deleted yet", cp.wasDeleteTableCalled());
716     admin.deleteTable(TEST_TABLE);
717     assertFalse("Test table should have been deleted",
718         admin.tableExists(TEST_TABLE));
719     assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on table delete",
720         cp.wasDeleteTableCalled());
721   }
722 
723   private void modifyTableSync(HBaseAdmin admin, byte[] tableName, HTableDescriptor htd)
724       throws IOException {
725     admin.modifyTable(tableName, htd);
726     //wait until modify table finishes
727     for (int t = 0; t < 100; t++) { //10 sec timeout
728       HTableDescriptor td = admin.getTableDescriptor(htd.getName());
729       if (td.equals(htd)) {
730         break;
731       }
732       Threads.sleep(100);
733     }
734   }
735 
736   @Test
737   public void testRegionTransitionOperations() throws Exception {
738     MiniHBaseCluster cluster = UTIL.getHBaseCluster();
739 
740     HMaster master = cluster.getMaster();
741     MasterCoprocessorHost host = master.getCoprocessorHost();
742     CPMasterObserver cp = (CPMasterObserver)host.findCoprocessor(
743         CPMasterObserver.class.getName());
744     cp.enableBypass(false);
745     cp.resetStates();
746 
747     HTable table = UTIL.createTable(TEST_TABLE, TEST_FAMILY);
748 
749     try {
750       int countOfRegions = UTIL.createMultiRegions(table, TEST_FAMILY);
751       UTIL.waitUntilAllRegionsAssigned(countOfRegions);
752       
753       NavigableMap<HRegionInfo, ServerName> regions = table.getRegionLocations();
754       Map.Entry<HRegionInfo, ServerName> firstGoodPair = null;
755       for (Map.Entry<HRegionInfo, ServerName> e: regions.entrySet()) {
756         if (e.getValue() != null) {
757           firstGoodPair = e;
758           break;
759         }
760       }
761       assertNotNull("Found a non-null entry", firstGoodPair);
762       LOG.info("Found " + firstGoodPair.toString());
763       // Try to force a move
764       Collection<ServerName> servers = master.getClusterStatus().getServers();
765       String destName = null;
766       String serverNameForFirstRegion = firstGoodPair.getValue().toString();
767       LOG.info("firstRegionHostnamePortStr=" + serverNameForFirstRegion);
768       boolean found = false;
769       // Find server that is NOT carrying the first region
770       for (ServerName info : servers) {
771         LOG.info("ServerName=" + info);
772         if (!serverNameForFirstRegion.equals(info.getServerName())) {
773           destName = info.toString();
774           found = true;
775           break;
776         }
777       }
778       assertTrue("Found server", found);
779       LOG.info("Found " + destName);
780       master.move(firstGoodPair.getKey().getEncodedNameAsBytes(),
781         Bytes.toBytes(destName));
782       assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on region move",
783         cp.wasMoveCalled());
784   
785       // make sure balancer is on
786       master.balanceSwitch(true);
787       assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on balance switch",
788           cp.wasBalanceSwitchCalled());
789   
790       // force region rebalancing
791       master.balanceSwitch(false);
792       // move half the open regions from RS 0 to RS 1
793       HRegionServer rs = cluster.getRegionServer(0);
794       byte[] destRS = Bytes.toBytes(cluster.getRegionServer(1).getServerName().toString());
795       //Make sure no regions are in transition now
796       waitForRITtoBeZero(master);
797       List<HRegionInfo> openRegions = rs.getOnlineRegions();
798       int moveCnt = openRegions.size()/2;
799       for (int i=0; i<moveCnt; i++) {
800         HRegionInfo info = openRegions.get(i);
801         if (!info.isMetaTable()) {
802           master.move(openRegions.get(i).getEncodedNameAsBytes(), destRS);
803         }
804       }
805       //Make sure no regions are in transition now
806       waitForRITtoBeZero(master);
807       // now trigger a balance
808       master.balanceSwitch(true);
809       boolean balanceRun = master.balance();
810       assertTrue("Coprocessor should be called on region rebalancing",
811           cp.wasBalanceCalled());
812     } finally {
813       UTIL.deleteTable(TEST_TABLE);
814     }
815   }
816 
817   @Test
818   public void testSnapshotOperations() throws Exception {
819     MiniHBaseCluster cluster = UTIL.getHBaseCluster();
820     HMaster master = cluster.getMaster();
821     MasterCoprocessorHost host = master.getCoprocessorHost();
822     CPMasterObserver cp = (CPMasterObserver)host.findCoprocessor(
823         CPMasterObserver.class.getName());
824     cp.resetStates();
825 
826     // create a table
827     HTableDescriptor htd = new HTableDescriptor(TEST_TABLE);
828     htd.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(TEST_FAMILY));
829     HBaseAdmin admin = UTIL.getHBaseAdmin();
830 
831     // delete table if exists
832     if (admin.tableExists(TEST_TABLE)) {
833       UTIL.deleteTable(TEST_TABLE);
834     }
835 
836     admin.createTable(htd);
837     admin.disableTable(TEST_TABLE);
838     assertTrue(admin.isTableDisabled(TEST_TABLE));
839 
840     try {
841       // Test snapshot operation
842       assertFalse("Coprocessor should not have been called yet",
843         cp.wasSnapshotCalled());
844       admin.snapshot(TEST_SNAPSHOT, TEST_TABLE);
845       assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on snapshot",
846         cp.wasSnapshotCalled());
847 
848       // Test clone operation
849       admin.cloneSnapshot(TEST_SNAPSHOT, TEST_CLONE);
850       assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on snapshot clone",
851         cp.wasCloneSnapshotCalled());
852       assertFalse("Coprocessor restore should not have been called on snapshot clone",
853         cp.wasRestoreSnapshotCalled());
854       admin.disableTable(TEST_CLONE);
855       assertTrue(admin.isTableDisabled(TEST_TABLE));
856       admin.deleteTable(TEST_CLONE);
857 
858       // Test restore operation
859       cp.resetStates();
860       admin.restoreSnapshot(TEST_SNAPSHOT);
861       assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on snapshot restore",
862         cp.wasRestoreSnapshotCalled());
863       assertFalse("Coprocessor clone should not have been called on snapshot restore",
864         cp.wasCloneSnapshotCalled());
865 
866       admin.deleteSnapshot(TEST_SNAPSHOT);
867       assertTrue("Coprocessor should have been called on snapshot delete",
868         cp.wasDeleteSnapshotCalled());
869     } finally {
870       admin.deleteTable(TEST_TABLE);
871     }
872   }
873 
874   private void waitForRITtoBeZero(HMaster master) throws IOException {
875     // wait for assignments to finish
876     AssignmentManager mgr = master.getAssignmentManager();
877     Collection<AssignmentManager.RegionState> transRegions =
878         mgr.getRegionsInTransition().values();
879     for (AssignmentManager.RegionState state : transRegions) {
880       mgr.waitOnRegionToClearRegionsInTransition(state.getRegion());
881     }
882   }

885   public org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ResourceCheckerJUnitRule cu =
886     new org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ResourceCheckerJUnitRule();
887 }
